sentences.en: I had a slight altercation with some people who objected to our filming.
sentences.cn: 我和一些反对我们拍电影的人之间发生了一点点小争执。

sentences.en: The France defender begins a three-match suspension on Saturday because of an altercation with Pablo Zabaleta.
sentences.cn: 这位法国后卫因为巴布罗·萨巴莱塔发生冲突，他在周六开始为期三场的停赛。

sentences.en: After an altercation, they arrested Younis Tsouli (pictured above).
sentences.cn: 一阵争吵过后，警察逮捕了younis tsouli(上图)。
